attributes.action: Only allow High Street retailers to sell their products in the U.K if they are paying their emplyees a fair wage i.e they are trading fairly, they are enabling their employees to work in safe and hygenic conditions, and are using no child labour
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many High Street Retailers are opening factories abroad in order to cut labour costs, however many workers are not being entitled to fair pay and safe and hygenic working conditions, there also cases where child labour is being used and there are also claims of human traffiking and slavery in more extreme cases.
Therefore, the Prime Minister should only allow High Street Retailers such as TOPSHOP and next to continue trading in the U.K if they meet the standards of this petition and this has been checked by the Prime Minister and they not breached any human rights in their trading.
